query: What steps are needed to tame a wolf?
generated_answer:
Feed a wolf bones.  The number of bones required is random; each bone has a 1⁄3 chance of taming the wolf.  A wolf cannot be tamed if it is hostile or already tamed.


📌 *Read more at:* [Minecraft Wiki](https://minecraft.wiki)
ground_truth_answer: Right-click a wild wolf with a bone until hearts appear, then it becomes tamed.

ground_truth_answer: Arrange two iron ingots and one stick according to the instructions on minecraft.wiki to craft an Iron Sword.

query: How can I convert a diamond pickaxe to a netherite pickaxe?
generated_answer:
Use a netherite ingot and a netherite upgrade smithing table to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to a netherite pickaxe.


📌 *Read more at:* [Minecraft Wiki](https://minecraft.wiki)
ground_truth_answer: Use a smithing table to combine a diamond pickaxe with a netherite ingot, upgrading it to a netherite pickaxe.

query: What is the process to create a lingering potion?
generated_answer:
Adding dragon's breath to a splash potion creates a lingering potion.


📌 *Read more at:* [Minecraft Wiki](https://minecraft.wiki)
ground_truth_answer: Brew a splash potion and then add dragon's breath in the brewing stand to create a lingering potion.

generated_answer:
Bees can be bred by giving them any of the following, with the exceptions of open eyeblossom and wither rose:  (Specific blocks are not listed in the provided text).  This will cause them to enter love mode and create a baby bee, granting 1-7 experience. Parent bees have a 5-minute cooldown before breeding again, and babies mature in 20 minutes (1 in-game day).


📌 *Read more at:* [Minecraft Wiki](https://minecraft.wiki)
ground_truth_answer: Place flowers near a beehive or bee nest and wait for bees to gather pollen; they will eventually produce a new bee if conditions are met.

query: What is the process to tame a cat?
generated_answer:
Stray cats can be tamed using raw cod or raw salmon. Each has a 1/3 chance of taming the cat.  Once tamed, they follow the player, don't despawn, and no longer fear the player.  See "Behavior for how to approach a cat" (this information is not provided in the given context).


📌 *Read more at:* [Minecraft Wiki](https://minecraft.wiki)
ground_truth_answer: Feed stray cats raw fish until they display hearts, at which point they become tamed.
